Works perfectly on Windows 7 Ultimate x32.

Those with 64bit Win7 might want to change the patcher install Directory from:
C:\Program Files\Pegasys Inc\TMPGEnc 4.0 XPress
to:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Pegasys Inc\TMPGEnc 4.0 XPress
